channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Rioter’s White Hood
item.description: The face mask is now part of the kit of rioters, as useful, indispensable, and emblematic as a Klansman’s white hood.

item.title: It’s Time For Trump To Play Hardball With Qatar

item.title: Menendez to report to prison for 11-year term for corruption
item.description: Former Sen. Bob Menendez, a Democrat from New Jersey, to report to federal prison on an 11-year sentence in a sweeping bribery and corruption scandal.

item.title: Factories of Progress
item.description: Policies that hinder globalization and reduce trade are policies that decrease global prosperity and increase global poverty.

item.title: Report: Riot-Ravaged L.A. Paid Out $1.1 Billion In Overtime Hours Last Year
item.description: Five city employees last year made more than the $400,000 annual salary of the president of the United States, according to the OTB report.
